title: League wont start. Help me!
body: My launcher wont start, anyone knows how to fix it? It says that RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe fails to launch, and I have tried everything i can think of. Please help me!

replies.body: This message usually indicates a security or OS setting that's preventing the game from launching.  Give our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide a go to get this fixed!  Let me know if you have any questions!
Did you attempt to restart computer or make sure everything League related is not running in the background. Im not tech expert, but a simple reinstall could do you some justice.
